Title: Senior Manager Agency Business Partner
Company: Sun Life Vietnam (Sun Life)
Location: Vietcombank Tower, Công trường Mê Linh, Bến Nghé, District 1, Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam, Tầng L29,L30,Tòa Nhà Vietcombank Tower,5 Công Trường Mê Linh, Phường Sài Gòn, TP Hồ Chí Minh, Việt Nam
Job Description:
Job purpose:
Responsible for leading and coordinating sales operations within the Sales Region based on geographical assignment for the Agency Channel. This role involves partnering with agency leaders, managing sales activities, and implementing strategies to drive business growth and improve sales quality. The position also focuses on expanding market share through leadership recruitment, developing training programs, and building business plans to achieve key performance indicators (KPIs) for the Agency Channel.

Major accountabilities:
1. Business Operations & Production Management
- Oversee and direct business activities of the Agency Channel across the assigned Sales Region.
- Partner with Agency Leaders to develop and execute strategies that meet business objectives and KPIs.
- Provide leadership, guidance, and continuous support to enhance overall agency performance.
- Conduct regular performance reviews and deliver insights to improve business outcomes.

2. Activity Management, After-sales Service & Compensation Policies
- Develop and implement business activities, after-sales service initiatives, contest programs, and compensation policies to promote business growth.
- Drive quality improvement across agency activities, ensuring consistency and effectiveness.
- Ensure strict compliance with company policies, financial standards, and regulatory requirements.
- Coordinate with relevant departments to resolve policy or process-related issues promptly.

3. Market Expansion & Leadership Recruitment
- Identify opportunities to expand the Agency Channel within the assigned geographical Sales Region.
- Support the recruitment, onboarding, and retention of Managing Directors and Agency Leaders to strengthen the sales force.
- Collaborate with Talent Acquisition and business leaders to build a robust agency leadership pipeline.
- Contribute to increasing market share through strategic people development initiatives.

4. Training, Development & Business Planning
- Design, deliver, and manage training programs to enhance the competencies of Agency Leaders and team members.
- Facilitate continuous learning through coaching, workshops, and capability-building sessions.
- Develop and align business plans with channel KPIs, working closely with regional leaders to ensure execution.
- Track performance against plans, identify gaps, and propose improvement measures.

5. Handle ad-hoc projects as assigned

Title: KEY ACCOUNT SUPERVISOR (DIRECT SALES) - HOSPITALITY CHANNEL
Company: Công Ty TNHH Một Thành Viên Kärcher
Location: 811A-811B Trường Chinh, Tây Thạnh, Tân Phú, HCM, 811A- 811B, Trường Chinh, Tây Thạnh, Tân Phú
Job Description:
WHAT WILL YOU DO WHILE YOU WOW:

I. CORE RESPONSIBILITIES:
• Sales & Business Growth: Directly responsible for achieving and exceeding sales targets/KPIs for the assigned strategic client segment (Key Accounts).
• Key Account Management (KAM): Develop, maintain, and expand strategic relationships with top-tier clients in the Southern region.
• Market Strategy: Analyze market trends and competitor activities to propose effective business strategies for the target industries.

II. DETAILED TASKS:
1. BUSINESS PLANNING & REPORTING:
• Develop detailed sales plans quarterly/annually, including sales goals, market penetration strategies, and the Key Account list (KAM list) development plan.
• Monitor and synthesize daily/weekly/monthly KPIs for the team and the Key Account portfolio.
• Provide regular reports to management on business results, analysis of sales performance, and the competitive landscape.
• Gather Market Intelligence on industry trends, competitor products, and the equipment investment needs of Key Accounts.

2. KEY ACCOUNT MANAGEMENT & RELATIONSHIP DEVELOPMENT:
• Serve as the Main Point of Contact, providing strategic support and comprehensive solutions to maximize product efficiency and profitability for the client.
• Negotiation & Contract Drafting: Prepare, present, and negotiate large-scale sales agreements/framework contracts meticulously and profitably.
• Ensure high Customer Satisfaction, proactively conducting visits, surveys, and resolving issues promptly to solidify a sustainable partnership.
• Develop and implement special care programs/customer loyalty programs to enhance engagement and increase the customer retention rate.

3. OPERATIONAL MANAGEMENT & SALES EFFICIENCY:
• Manage the sales process, from order placement to installation, ensuring goods are delivered in full, of the correct type, on time, and at an optimized cost.
• Ensure that Key Account sales and service activities are performed transparently and achieve high profit efficiency.
• Coordinate with the warehouse department to monitor inventory of main equipment and spare parts, minimizing the risk of stock-outs that could impact KA service.

Title: HR Officer
Company: ROCK WOOL KHAI HOAN COMPANY LIMITED
Location: Lô C4, đường số 2, KCN Hải Sơn, ấp Bình Tiền 2, Xã Đức Hòa, Tỉnh Tây Ninh, Việt Nam, Lô C4, Đường số 2, KCN Hải Sơn, Bình Tiền 2, Đức Hòa Hạ, Đức Hòa, Long An.
Job Description:
1. Job Purpose & Scope
The HR Officer is responsible for managing and executing a wide range of HR and administrative functions, including recruitment, timekeeping, payroll, labor contracts, employee evaluation, social insurance, personal income tax (PIT), and office administration. This position supports both blue-collar and white-collar staffing needs and ensures compliance with labor laws and company policies. The role also plays a key part in maintaining an efficient, compliant, and well-organized HR operation that supports business objectives and employee satisfaction.
2. Key Result Areas
• Recruitment
• Performance Management
• Training & Development
• Compensation & Benefit Management
• HR Administratives & Services
3. Key Responsibilities & Job Content
• Recruitment: Ensure timely recruitment of office staff and blue-collar workers with the right qualifications and job fit.
• Performance Management: Prepare HR information for the performance review process. Assist the HOD and Manager for the performance analysis, career development and training support.
• Training & Development: Assist the line manager for the training need analysis, training plan and training provide to achieve the business training plan and the law requirements.
• Compensation & Benefit management: Assist the manager collecting welfare and benefits data, ensuring the company welfare and benefits are competitive. Assist the manager for collecting and screening payroll information for the payroll process.
• HR Administratives & Services: Ensuring the HR policy is up-to-date. Maintaining administrative & HR services tasks including the employee activity are satisfaction level.

Company Overview:
Coherent Corp. is a global leaders in datacenter and communications industries. Headquartered in Saxonburg, Pennsylvania, USA, and founded in 1971, Coherent operates in over 20 countries worldwide. Since entering Vietnam in 2005, Coherent has expanded to over 2,400 employees across Binh Duong (VSIP1), Dong Nai (Nhon Trach 1), Hanoi, and Bac Ninh (Yen Phong IP). As part of our global growth strategy and commitment to local talent development, we aim to create over 4,000 new job opportunities in Vietnam within the next five years.
